member.name: T:DWNavigationPane.Element
member.summary: Provides inheritable attached framework-level set of properties for all DW Navigation Pane controls.

member.name: F:DWNavigationPane.Element.IconSizeProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the Pane Icon(s).

member.name: F:DWNavigationPane.Element.IconContainerSizeProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the Pane Icon Container(s).

member.name: F:DWNavigationPane.Element.BackgroundHoverProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the background when hovered over by the mouse.

member.name: F:DWNavigationPane.Element.ForegroundHoverProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the foreground when hovered over by the mouse.

member.summary: Indicates the template of the Icon of the Pane Item

member.name: T:DWNavigationPane.ItemTemplate
member.summary: Indicates the template of the Pane Item

member.summary: Gets or sets the template for the Icon of the Pane Item.

member.name: F:DWNavigationPane.Item.ItemTemplateProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the template for the Pane Item.

member.summary: Gets or sets the icon of the Pane item.

member.name: F:DWNavigationPane.Item.BadgeProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the badge of the Pane item.

member.name: F:DWNavigationPane.Item.BackgroundProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the background for the Item. This background is applied to the Item before the Trigger for hover.

member.name: F:DWNavigationPane.Item.ForegroundProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the foreground for the Item. This foreground is applied to the Item before the Trigger for hover.

member.summary: Provides the basic properties of a PaneButton

member.summary: Provides a container for the PackIconControl

member.name: M:DWNavigationPane.PaneIcon.PaneIcon_Loaded(System.Object,System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)
member.summary: Triggers the BadgeChangedStoryboard at startup.
member.remarks: The BadgeChangedStoryboard is not triggered when the Badged control is initialized. This raises issues where the badge looks different when the badge is changed. Triggering the BadgeChangedStoryboard at startup will show the expected layout of a Badge at it's initial state.

member.name: T:DWNavigationPane.PaneItem
member.summary: Provides the basic properties of a PaneItem

member.summary: Provides the basic properties of a PaneToggleButton

member.name: T:DWNavigationPane.AnimatedPane
member.summary: Provides the basic properties for an animated Pane.

member.name: F:DWNavigationPane.AnimatedPane.PaneOpenedEvent
member.summary: Raised Event when the Pane is opened

member.name: F:DWNavigationPane.AnimatedPane.PaneClosedEvent
member.summary: Raised Event when the Pane is closed

member.name: P:DWNavigationPane.AnimatedPane.IsTransformInverted
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the Pane transform progress is inverted.

member.name: P:DWNavigationPane.AnimatedPane.OpenTransformAnimation
member.summary: Animates the TransformProgress Property from 0.0 to 1.0 when the Pane opens.

member.name: P:DWNavigationPane.AnimatedPane.CloseTransformAnimation
member.summary: Animates the TransformProgress Property from 1.0 to 0.0 when the Pane opens.

member.name: M:DWNavigationPane.AnimatedPane.OnTransformAnimationChanged(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Freezes the new TransformAnimation.

member.name: P:DWNavigationPane.AnimatedPane.TransformedValue
member.summary: Gets the current resulting transformed value for the AnimatedPane. This is computed internally for inheriting Panes.

member.name: P:DWNavigationPane.AnimatedPane.TransformProgress
member.summary: A percentage value representing the progress of the Pane's transformation. Gets the current TransformProgress of the Pane. This is handled internally by the Pane using the Open and Close TransformAnimations.

member.name: P:DWNavigationPane.AnimatedPane.IsOpen
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the Pane is open or not.

member.name: M:DWNavigationPane.AnimatedPane.OnIsOpenChanged(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Starts animation for the TransformProgress when IsOpen is changed. Raises the corresponding Event.

member.name: T:DWNavigationPane.ExtendingPanel
member.summary: An Panel that extends when it opens.

member.name: P:DWNavigationPane.ExtendingPanel.CompactWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the Panel when compact.

member.name: P:DWNavigationPane.ExtendingPanel.ExtendedWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the Panel when extended.

member.name: T:DWNavigationPane.HorizontalSlideDirection
member.summary: Indicates where the Pane should slide horizontally

member.name: T:DWNavigationPane.SlidingPanel
member.summary: An Panel that slides when it opens.

member.name: P:DWNavigationPane.SlidingPanel.SlideDirection
member.summary: Indicates where the Panel should slide.

member.name: T:DWNavigationPane.StaticPane
member.summary: A classic standard Pane with no animations.
